attributes.action: Keep Christmas in Britain Unchanged and to stop trying to impress other religions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like it to be known that most of the people in the British Isles (who are British) would like Christmas to stay unchanged and kept in its Traditonal form the way it has been fo year gone past. I am afraid that my Children and there children will end up not knowing the meaning of the words giving to others and the Birth of christ.Christmas is one of very few traditions that stll holds a place in peoples hearts please please do not take that away by renaming it or dictating what decorations or emblems people can use thank you.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep Christmas in Britain Unchanged and to stop trying to impress other religions."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11422.asp
